PATIENT_ID: TEST_TRANSMED_003
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-01-28 18:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-01-28 18:10:00
Category I activation for 26-year-old male, GSW to chest.
Transmediastinal gunshot wound suspected. Mediastinal involvement possible.
BP 90/55, HR 125, RR 26. Hemodynamically unstable.
Entry wound left anterior chest. No exit wound identified.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-01-28 18:40:00
Patient taken directly to OR. No CT chest imaging obtained.
No documentation of signs of life assessment.
No chest x-ray obtained prior to surgery.
No esophageal imaging documented.
